page.title: 04 Housing.
page.content: Enville Rd is mainly private.It was built before World war II with a post war ribbon development of bungalow's, semi-detached & detached houses.There is a post war council development to the west side of Enville Rd. White Hill has a large council develop- ment built in the 1950's also a private development of pre & post war houses. Heather Drive has six bungalow's ten detached eight semi-detached houses. Forest Drive has fifteen bungalow's five detached houses fourteen semi- detached houses.Meddins Lane-mostly private detached & semi-detached.Ten council houses c 1926,post war estate built behind Meddins Lane. Public amenities-W.C. 5. Telephone 4. Drinking fountin 1. (Heather Drive).
